vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κίς, ὁ,
genitive κιός, accusative κῖν, weevil, κεῖνον [τὸν χρυσὸν] οὐ σὴς οὐδὲ κὶς δάπτει [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732);
father of: Saul (H7586G)
§ Kish, "bow, power"
Kish, the father of Saul, (Proper name), indeclinable, Acts 13:21*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基士 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "陷阱"
掃羅（以色列第一個王）的父親 (徒 13:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基士 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "陷阱"
扫罗（以色列第一个王）的父亲 (徒 13:21)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Kích; Ki-sơ; Ki-lơ. H7027 Kích là cha của vua Sau-lơ
